channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【MadeYouReset: An HTTP/2 vulnerability thwarted by Rapid Reset mitigations】MadyOureSet：http/2漏洞被快速复位缓解挫败
item.description: 【 A new HTTP/2 denial-of-service (DoS) vulnerability called MadeYouReset was recently disclosed by security researchers. Cloudflare HTTP DDoS mitigation, already protects from MadeYouReset. 】安全研究人员最近披露了一个新的HTTP/2拒绝服务（DOS）漏洞。 Cloudflare HTTP DDOS缓解措施，已经可以保护MadyYouReset。

item.title: 【Serverless Statusphere: a walk through building serverless ATProto applications on Cloudflare’s Developer Platform】无服务器状态：通过CloudFlare的开发人员平台上的无服务器ATPROTO应用程序漫步
item.description: 【 Build and deploy real-time, decentralized Authenticated Transfer Protocol (ATProto) apps on Cloudflare Workers. 】在CloudFlare工人上构建和部署实时，分散的身份验证转移协议（ATPROTO）应用程序。

item.title: 【Aligning our prices and packaging with the problems we help customers solve】使我们的价格和包装与我们帮助客户解决的问题保持一致
item.description: 【 You asked for simplicity. We listened. Introducing Externa and Interna, two new use-case-driven packages to simplify how you connect and protect your entire infrastructure. 】您要求简单。我们听了。介绍了两个新的用例驱动软件包Externa和Interna，以简化您如何连接和保护整个基础架构。

item.title: 【Reducing double spend latency from 40 ms to < 1 ms on privacy proxy】将双重延迟从40毫秒降低到<1 ms的隐私代理
item.description: 【 We significantly sped up our privacy proxy service by fixing a 40ms delay in "double-spend" checks. 】我们通过修复40毫秒的“双重款式”检查来大大加强了我们的隐私委托服务。

item.title: 【Vulnerability disclosure on SSL for SaaS v1 (Managed CNAME)】SaaS V1的SSL漏洞披露（托管CNAME）
item.description: 【 An upcoming vulnerability disclosure in Cloudflare’s SSL for SaaSv1 is detailed, explaining the steps we’ve taken towards deprecation. 】详细说明了我们为贬值所采取的步骤。

item.title: 【Building Jetflow: a framework for flexible, performant data pipelines at Cloudflare】构建喷气流：Cloudflare的灵活，性能数据管道的框架
item.description: 【 Faced with a data-ingestion challenge at a massive scale, Cloudflare's Business Intelligence team built a new framework called Jetflow. 】面对大规模的数据开发挑战，Cloudflare的商业智能团队建立了一个名为Jetflow的新框架。

item.title: 【Partnering with OpenAI to bring their new open models onto Cloudflare Workers AI】与Openai合作将他们的新开放模型带到Cloudflare工人AI
item.description: 【 OpenAI’s newest open-source models are now available on Cloudflare Workers AI on Day 0, with support for Responses API, Code Interpreter and Web Search (coming soon). 】OpenAI的最新开源型号现在可在CloudFlare工人AI上获得，并支持响应API，代码解释器和Web搜索（即将推出）。

item.title: 【Redesigning Workers KV for increased availability and faster performance】重新设计工人KV，以提高可用性和更快的性能
item.description: 【 Workers KV is Cloudflare's global key-value store. After the incident on June 12, we re-architected KV’s redundant storage backend, remove single points of failure, and make substantial improvements. 】工人KV是Cloudflare的全球钥匙值商店。 6月12日事件发生后，我们重新建立了KV的冗余存储后端，删除单点失败并做出了重大改进。

item.title: 【The White House AI Action Plan: a new chapter in U.S. AI policy】白宫AI行动计划：美国AI政策的新篇章
item.description: 【 The White House AI Action Plan is a pivotal policy document outlining the current administration's priorities and deliverables in AI to establish American AI as the gold standard for AI worldwide. 】白宫AI行动计划是一项关键的政策文件，概述了当前政府在AI中的优先事项和可交付成果，以确立American AI为全球AI的黄金标准。

item.title: 【Perplexity is using stealth, undeclared crawlers to evade website no-crawl directives】困惑正在使用隐形，未申报的爬网逃避网站无爬行指令
item.description: 【 Perplexity is repeatedly modifying their user agent and changing IPs and ASNs to hide their crawling activity, in direct conflict with explicit no-crawl preferences expressed by websites. 】困惑性正在反复修改其用户代理，并更改IPS和ASN，以隐藏其爬行活动，直接与网站表达的明确无爬行偏好冲突。
